On 8/25/11, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Nighlight is  a lost protophorm from the Beast wars, her pod was buried due
> that she wasnt found till some years ago since then she was active.
>
> Perceptor is a old decepticon rebuilt as  predacon, he came to earth (I dont
> remember the circunstances) and he wasnt involved the war between Autobots
> and decepticons.
>
> Windlord is another lost protophorm but he was active after Maximals and
> Preds left the earth and neo beast wars started.
>
> Talon is a unicronian by origin but she defected and was rebuilted as
> maximal.
>
> Elita born as any biological creature

Cool,

Thank you Airly. I do have a question or two :)

Was Talon a Decepticon or Autobot who was rebuilt into a Unicronian -
something like Glavatron, Cyclonus and Scourge or did Unicron create
her from scratch?

Also with Perceptor, how long has he been active? Was he alive during
the great war between the Autobots and Decepticons (Think of the 80's
cartoon or comic books) or did he appear after the defeat of the
Decepticons and peace accord that came after that? He didn't have to
participate in anything, but just trying to get a feel for how old he
is.

- Preston
